title: Feels pretty bad to get a champion shard out of chests
body: Grind up all those fragments, use your last chest hoping for something you can use aaaand..... champion. I have literally no use for it. I can't use them, disenchanting them gives me blue essence which I can't use for anything, and I can only turn them into another champion that I already have. Why waste my keys and chests?

replies.body: If you want a skin then just go buy it. Want a random skin? get a mystery skin box. Seriously, I don't understand why you would buy a hextech crafting box, the odds just aren't that good. Better to play a bunch of games and be pleasantly surprised by what you get for free.

On the PBE, the chances of getting champions are 1 in every 5 chances you could get a skin. If you get 3 champ shards, you can get a champ you don't own... but that's only if you have them. I get what Riot is doing, none the less, and this complaint isn't too drastic. The only complaint I have is the fact a new player only gets one free champ that they could achieve in a day (Garen or Ashe). Why not at least make it more random? And keep it above the 3150 bracket. Give them something that they would have to work for, something that could take a month of games rather than a day. I'd be thrilled to get a Wukong for free over a Poppy because I could buy Poppy and the rest of the 450s in a month or two but Wukong would take two weeks by himself.

That's what you can get when you gamble. XD

The moral of the story is not to gamble with your money kids.
Thats what these chests are, a gamble. Dont complain because you didn't get what you wanted, its pretty clear that your taking a risk by buying one.
You're replying to the wrong guy. I'm not the one complaining about it.
They should make a converter, Like X amount of Blue Essence turns into X amount of Orange Essence.
Yeah, it's pretty lame for people who have all champions. Riot has said they've got plans to make champion shards and/or blue essence be useful for them, but who knows when/if that'll happen.

Round the same time they bring back solo Q

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
More like, we'll probably see Yoricks rework before it happens.
Yorick is going to be reworked after the mage update by the way :)

It would actually be sort of silly to buy chests and keys with RP knowing that champion shards come from them and that you have all champions. My last 2 chests gave me champions that i already have so if I actually had all champions and just wanted skins I wouldn't buy the chest because I know for a fact that I'm going to get champion shards and it would be a waste of RP. At the end of the day we are being rewarded for what we do anyways and that's simply playing.
I get that, but feedback is important. Just letting them know what could be better about it.

Yeah that's a serious flaw of this system, I get how they don't give you 48 skin shards a year for free, but it shouldn't just drop champions, it must be really dissatisfying for players who have most of them - and those are likely most dedicated players out there.

And I don't mean it's flaw only from player's point of view, I personally - and I think many people like me - aren't going to ever buy any piece of hextech stuff for RP, because right now if I don't want champions, it seems I'm better off just getting skins for full price, old way.
